name: Qelline Alderleaf

personality.mannerisms: Offers food immediately, practical advice, motherly concern

role: Halfling farmer. Town's informal information network hub. Willing to let party sleep in hayloft.
son: Carp (10 years old, precocious, wants to be adventurer)
carps_discovery: Found secret tunnel near Tresendar Manor. Saw 'big ugly bandits' meet with Redbrands. Can lead party to tunnel (enters Redbrand hideout area 8).
quest: Consult druid Reidoth about Cragmaw Castle or Wave Echo Cave location. He's at Thundertree ruins (~50 miles NW). Provides directions.
information: Reidoth knows every inch of land. If anyone knows where things are, he does.
